title: Generative AI Utilization and Learning Process Innovation in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A social sector curriculum for vocational training institutions emphasizing the educational integration and practical application of generative AI

learning_goals: One can propose at least three educational applications of generative AI tools (e.g., chatbots, translators).
One can analyze ethical issues arising from AI tool usage and suggest alternatives.
One can systematically design a step-by-step process for selecting and applying AI tools aligned with learning objectives.
One can explain at least five criteria for evaluating the credibility of AI-generated content.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
